project_plan.name: Word Frequency Counter
project_plan.description: Develop a Python program that reads a text file, counts the frequency of each word, and displays the top 10 most common words in the terminal.

task.name: Implement functionality to read a text file
Parse the contents of the file and count the frequency of each word
Identify and store the top 10 most common words and their counts
Implement display functionality to show the top 10 most common words in the terminal
Write tests to verify the functionality of reading, counting, and displaying words
Execute tests to ensure that the word counting and displaying features function correctly
